ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] 25 New Everquest Spoilers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It was his 3rd post advertising that particular website. It was also his 3rd post full stop. The first was a short one on the 10th, the second and third
ygData.messageBody:
Su wrote:
> If he posts that message again he's getting kicked.
> I wasn't sure if he posted here more than once or if it was just that
> I saw it on other lists.

It was his 3rd post advertising that particular website. It was also his
3rd post full stop.

The first was a short one on the 10th, the second and third were
essentially identical, just different subject lines, on the 14th and
18th.

Matt
